info.brief_description: Somewhere, somehow, a girl wakes up massively curvy!
info.description:
Somewhere in the multiverse, a girl wakes up, completely naked. Her breasts are at least half a dozen cup sizes larger, and her hips are almost twice as wide at least. She might be the only one, or it might be everyone. Everyone might think she's always been this way, or lose their minds at the sight of her. Her clothes might have changed to fit her new curves or she might be wearing a bedsheet until she can find something bigger for her new rack.

NOTE: One sentence additions are now unacceptable. I'm going to start pruning this story for quality fairly heavily. Please try to take your time and write a detailed addition. It's not a race!

Things that are acceptable (and awesome!):
-Oppai Loli
-Further breast and ass expansion
-Giantess
-Gratuitous heterosexual or lesbian scenes (there's not really a lot of room here for guy-on-guy, but if you manage to squeeze it in somewhere, whatever)
-Bimboization
-Humiliation
-Boys growing (PE only)

Things that are not acceptable:
-Scat
-Guro
-Gas fetishism
-Slobs
-A lack of growing girl
-Anyone dying, really

Have fun and happy writing!
